I prefer product before token, and this is an opportunity to experiment with Arbitrum before potentially getting paid with an airdrop.

Kudos to @AvgJoesCrypto for the piece

Will it be better to wait for a token until fees are much higher?

Sequencers are fighting scraps right now and it is more profitable to participate in alternative L1s like Fantom. The growth now appears to be steady since the launch hype. https://t.co/0w6E4fOopp

Open questions to discuss:
- Why do developers pick Arbitrum over Metis or Boba, which have tokens/incentive programs?
- Is @arbitrum success due to @optimismPBC delays?
- How much attention with @EvmosOrg take away from L2s?

The potential valuation is fascinating, and I agree TVL may be the best analogue we have, but it's definitely not the best way to value a chain. 

Important considerations (why @solana deserves high valuation IMO) are future growth, tech, and narrative. https://t.co/KGAdcFKE1Z
